Name: The Mammoth: A Cave Painting
About the game: The Mammoth: A Cave Painting tells the 5 million year story of the mammoth in 5 minutes. At its very core it is a story about the inescapability of loss. Inspired by prehistoric cave-paintings, act out a story written on the wall of a cave. Search for your lost herd on the wide plain. Gather and protect your children. Struggle with human hunters. Experience the dynamic narration unfold as you tell your story.
